# UIUserInterfaceLayoutDirection

**Enumeration**

Constants that specify the directional flow of the user interface.

## Declaration

```swift
enum UIUserInterfaceLayoutDirection
```

## Overview

One of these constants is returned by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplication/userInterfaceLayoutDirection] property. It indicates the directionality of the language in the user interface of the app.

## Constants

- **UIUserInterfaceLayoutDirection.leftToRight**: The layout direction is left to right.
- **UIUserInterfaceLayoutDirection.rightToLeft**: The layout direction right to left.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Accessing the layout direction

- **userInterfaceLayoutDirection**: The layout direction of the user interface.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
